string.text: You said that you can reload this flamethrower? I think it needs it.

Yeah, no problem man, you got any fuel? Jeez, Don't say that I gotta look for it myself! Listen, this ain't a big deal for me really, but it's gonna cost 30000. And only after a drink. And I mean a REAL drink, got it?
More vodka? You're going to drink the Zone dry, look for it without me. And just so you know, 30000 isn't even worth the flamethrower, Hell with it.
That Vodka will be the death of you. Here's the fuel, and a bottle of the Zones finest. Just make it quick.
Hey, I'm not a machine!! ... give me about half an hour.
Alright, just remember - I need it as quick as possible.
I don't have any fuel. Just take 30000 and some Vodka. But you must work first, drink later ... got it!?
Well... Thanks. Don't worry, a day will be enough for this job.
What!? A whole day? You call yourself a specialist? Maybe a drinking specialist... See ya!!!
Hows the re-fuelling process coming along?
All right, thank you! Good man.
Hey, don't be so hasty... It is not that simple. Come back some other time!
